name: Transportation
description: Provide transport or driving assistance, such as taking beneficiaries to hospitals, clinics, or community centers.

name: Companionship
description: Offer emotional support and social interaction through friendly visits, conversations, or recreational activities.

name: Item Delivery
description: Assist in delivering or lending welfare items such as wheelchairs, walking aids, or household necessities to beneficiaries.

name: Tutoring
description: Provide educational or tutoring support in subjects like language, math, or computer skills.

name: Home Assistance
description: Help with simple household chores, cleaning, or home organization for those with mobility or health difficulties.

name: Digital Support
description: Guide beneficiaries in using smartphones, online forms, or communication tools for digital literacy improvement.

name: Health Escort
description: Accompany elderly or disabled beneficiaries to medical appointments and provide basic assistance during visits.

name: Community Events
description: Assist in organizing or supporting community events, charity drives, or public outreach programs.
